title: Bloomberg Markets: Broadcom Said to Plan Qualcomm Bid
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Broadcom Said to Plan Qualcomm Bid
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUESTS:\u0010Anand Srinivasan\u0010Semiconductors and Hardware Analyst\u0010Bloomberg Intelligence \u0010\u0010Ian King \u0010U.S. Semiconductor Reporter\u0010Bloomberg News \u0010Discussing Broadcom Ltd. considering a bid of more than $100 billion for Qualcomm Inc., according to people familiar with the matter, in what would be the biggest-ever takeover of a chipmaker.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
